metadata.synopsis: The player has entered surprise combat against a Nautiloid, with an initial bombarment followed by the ground being covered in target reticles.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load END_Maingoto 356; 15; 75Go left or right till the bombardment startswait for the first player turn

0.text: Nautiloid! Need to get to the brain - now.
